00030  * Revision 1.0  1996/ Pierre    Initial revision
00031  *
00032  *  VME_RESET_1190 (base);              ! Reset 
00033  *  VME_ENABLE_1190 (base);             ! Enable Front Panel Port (FPP)
00034  *  VME_DISABLE_1190 (base);            ! Enable VME port (disable FPP)
00035  *  VME_COUNT_1190 (base, d);           ! Read entry counter
00036  *  VME_READI4_1190 (base, b, r);       ! Read r entries of 32bit word size
00037  *  VME_READL2_1190 (base, d, r);       ! Read r entries of the low port in 32bit data
00038  *  VME_READH2_1190 (base, d, r);       ! Read r entries of the high port in 32 bit data
00039  *  VME_READL2_TONY_1190 (base, d, r);  ! Read r entries of the low port in 16bit data 
00040  *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00041 #ifndef _vme_h_
00042 #define _vme_h_
00043 #include "vxWorks.h"
00044 #include "vme.h"
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 #define A32D24         0xf0000000       /* A32D24 access */
00048 
00049 /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 
00051 #define VME_ENABLE_1190(_vmebase){\
00052                                     {\
00053                                        DWORD _ll, _local;\
00054                                        _ll = _vmebase;\
00055                                        _local = ((_ll) | 0x8002) | A32D24;\
00056                                        *(WORD *)_local = 0x1;\
00057                                    }\
00058                                 }
00059 
00060 #define VME_DISABLE_1190(_vmebase){\
00061                                     {\
00062                                        DWORD _ll, _local;\
00063                                       _ll = _vmebase;\
00064                                        _local = ((_ll) | 0x8002) | A32D24;\
00065                                        *(WORD *)_local = 0x0;\
00066                                    }\
00067                                 }
00068 
00069 #define VME_RESET_1190(_vmebase){\
00070                                    {\
00071                                       static DWORD _ll, _dummy, _local;\
00072                                       _ll = _vmebase;\
00073                                       _local = (_ll) | A32D24;\
00074                                       _dummy = *(WORD *) _local;\
00075                                   }\
00076                                }
00077 
00078 #define VME_COUNT_1190(_vmebase, _d){\
00079                                         {\
00080                                          DWORD _ll, *_pcount;\
00081                                          _ll = _vmebase;\
00082                                          _pcount = (DWORD *) (((_ll) | 0x8000) | A32D24);\
00083                                          *((WORD *) _d) = *(WORD *) _pcount;\
00084                                        }\
00085                                     }
00086 
00087 
00088 #define VME_READI4_1190(_vmebase,_d,_r){\
00089                                         {\
00090                                          DWORD _ll, *_local, __r, _count;\
00091                                          DWORD *_pcount;\
00092                                          __r = _r;\
00093                                          _ll = _vmebase;\
00094                                          _pcount = (DWORD *) (((_ll) | 0x8000) | A32D24);\
00095                                          _count = *(WORD *) _pcount;\
00096                                          if (_count <= __r)\
00097                                            __r = _count;\
00098                                          _local = (DWORD *)((_ll)  | A32D24);\
00099                                          while (__r > 0) {\
00100                                                 *_d++ = *_local++;\
00101                                                 __r--;}\
00102                                          }\
00103                                       }
00104 
00105 #define VME_READL2_1190(_vmebase,_d,_r){\
00106                                         {\
00107                                          DWORD _ll, *_pcount, *_local;\
00108                                          WORD _count, __r;\
00109                                          __r = _r;\
00110                                          _ll = _vmebase;\
00111                                          _pcount = (DWORD *) (((_ll) | 0x8000) | A32D24);\
00112                                          _count = *(WORD *) _pcount;\
00113                                          if (_count <= __r)\
00114                                            __r = _count;\
00115                                          _local = (DWORD *)((_ll)  | A32D24);\
00116                                          while (__r > 0) {\
00117                                                 *(WORD *) _d = *(WORD *)_local;\
00118                                                 ((WORD *)_d)++;\
00119                                                 (_local)++;\
00120                                                 __r--;}\
00121                                          }\
00122                                       }
00123 
00124 #define VME_READH2_1190(_vmebase,_d,_r){\
00125                                         {\
00126                                          DWORD _ll, *_pcount, *_local;\
00127                                          WORD _count, __r;\
00128                                          __r = _r;\
00129                                          _ll = _vmebase;\
00130                                          _pcount = (DWORD *) (((_ll) | 0x8000) | A32D24);\
00131                                          _count = *(WORD *) _pcount;\
00132                                          if (_count <= __r)\
00133                                            __r = _count;\
00134                                          _local = (DWORD *)((_ll)  | A32D24);\
00135                                          while (__r > 0) {\
00136                                                 *(WORD *) _d = *(++((WORD *)_local));\
00137                                                 ((WORD *)_d)++;\
00138                                                 ((WORD *)_local)++;\
00139                                                 __r--;}\
00140                                          }\
00141                                       }
00142 
00143 #define VME_READL2_TONY_1190(_vmebase,_d,_r){\
00144                                         {\
00145                                          DWORD _ll, *_pcount, *_local, __r, _count;\
00146                                          __r = _r;\
00147                                          _ll = _vmebase;\
00148                                          _pcount = (DWORD *) (((_ll) | 0x8000) | A32D24);\
00149                                          _count = *(WORD *) _pcount;\
00150                                          if (_count <= __r)\
00151                                            __r = _count;\
00152                                          _local = (DWORD *)((_ll)  | A32D24);\
00153                                          *(WORD *) _d = __r;\
00154                                          ((WORD *)_d)++;\
00155                                          while (__r > 0) {\
00156                                                 *(WORD *) _d = *(WORD *)_local;\
00157                                                 ((WORD *)_d)++;\
00158                                                 (_local)++;\
00159                                                 __r--;}\
00160                                          }\
00161                                       }
